ticket.title: Segmentation fault Ruby 187p302 and Rails 3.0.4
ticket.original-body:
C:\test\typo>rake db:migrate (in C:/test/typo) TypoPlugins: just registered plugin TypoPlugins::Gravatar for :avatar target. c:/ruby187/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-3.0.4/lib/active_support/core_ex t/module/remove_method.rb:3: [BUG] Segmentation fault ruby 1.8.7 (2010-08-16 patchlevel 302) [i386-mingw32]
This application has requested the Runtime to terminate it in an unusual way. Please contact the application's support team for more information.
I have confirmed that this problem do occur in 3.0.0 as well as 3.0.3.
ticket.latest-body:
C:\test\typo>rake db:migrate (in C:/test/typo) TypoPlugins: just registered plugin TypoPlugins::Gravatar for :avatar target. c:/ruby187/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-3.0.4/lib/active_support/core_ex t/module/remove_method.rb:3: [BUG] Segmentation fault ruby 1.8.7 (2010-08-16 patchlevel 302) [i386-mingw32]
This application has requested the Runtime to terminate it in an unusual way. Please contact the application's support team for more information.
I have confirmed that this problem do occur in 3.0.0 as well as 3.0.3.
